node.address: Av9 Norte # 21N-30, Barrio Granada , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
Hostal Casa del Gato is located in the heart of the nightlife district, 50 meters away from the famous Avenida 6. We are located in Barrio Granada in the center of Cali, close to important landmarks like San Antonio, Parque del Gato, La Hermita. Our area is known for its restaurants, and bars. The main station is only 5 minutes away, 30 minutes away from the airport.

We are proud to offer a total of 11 rooms, made to your needs, whether you enjoy privacy or want to socialize with the rest of our customers, its your choice.

Each room is simply furnished and offers a built-in wardrobe. They all have an iron and a fan. A shower and free toiletries can be found in the bathroom. You can enjoy a garden view from the room.

At Hostal Casa del Gato Cali you will find a 24-hour front desk and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared TV lounge and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling.
The guest house is 900 m from La Ermita Church, 1.1 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 1.4 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral. Farfan Airport is 77 km away.

description.description: Hostal Casa del Gato has an amazing outdoor pool to refresh you during the hot afternoons in 'la sucursal del cielo'. Free WiFi is included in all rooms. All rooms have TV and fans. We offer breakfast and launderette service as optional extras. We offer a wide range of walking tours to help you get to know the city. Collection from the airport is also available, so just contact us so we can help out!
